full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MTHU CHEN DGRA LHA CHEN PO MCHED DGU'I GSOL MCHOD DGRA LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO'I BKA' SDOD DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA MTHU RTZAL CAN DGRA LHA CHEN PO MCHED DGU'I GSOL MCHOD DGRA LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, JING GIR GNAM GYI RIGS RGYUD STOBS 'BYOR MNGA' THANG GIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, BLA MA DKON MCHOD LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD GUS DANG LDAN PA THU SA LAG CHI HUNG THA'I JI TSE DBANG RDO RJE LAGS NAS, ,RGYAL BLON 'BANGS DU MA'I LHA GSOL GYI DON DU PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL MA NAN CHER MDZAD PA LTAR, ,MKHAS GRUB DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA BADZRA KIRTIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB BU DGE TSUL BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'I, 'DIS KYANG DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I LHA BSRUNG MTHU STOBS CAN RNAMS KYIS RTAG TU 'GO ZHING STONG GROGS MDZAD DE BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN RGYA CHER THOGS SHING BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,LHA RGYAL LO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
